ActJudges Act
SubjectMargaret Esson ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. William A. Esson **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MARGARET ESSON, survivor of the Hon. William A. Esson, a Judge of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective July 15, 2016.
